subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With a goal-line stand and one big heave by Gus Frerotte, the Vikings grabbed control of the N.F.C. North race and sent the Bears home with a humbling defeat.
snippet: With a goal-line stand and one big heave by Gus Frerotte, the Vikings grabbed control of the N.F.C. North race and sent the Bears home with a humbling defeat.
